products.name: Visio AI
products.fullDescription: Visio AI is a full-featured, no-code platform for data analysis, machine learning, and data visualization. It is built to empower developers, analysts, and students to analyze datasets, generate visual insights, and train ML models — all through a friendly UI without extensive coding.

products.name: Radiant AI
products.fullDescription: Radiant AI transform your images with next-generation AI tools. Enhance, detect, restore old and degraded photos, colorize old photos. It provides cutting-edge image processing capabilities including enhancement, adjustment, upscaling, colorize, object/person detection, segmentation, and style transfer.

products.name: SPA AI
products.fullDescription: Automates complex business processes using artificial intelligence to reduce manual work and improve operational efficiency.

products.name: NGIBS
products.fullDescription: NGIBS (Next Gen Intelligent Browsing System) is an AI-powered search web app that helps you find and understand information more easily. Instead of just showing links, it uses advanced AI models to understand your question, search the web when needed, and summarize the most useful results for you.

products.name: Fission AI
products.description: All-in-one multimodal AI content creation platform
products.fullDescription: Fission AI is a powerful multimodal AI platform that brings multiple AI capabilities together in one simple interface. It enables users to generate videos, images, written content, and research outputs from text-based input using advanced AI models. Text to Video automatically creates visuals, stitches them into a video, and adds AI-generated narration, while Text to Text uses an LLM to generate, rewrite, or enhance content.

products.name: NLP Intelligent Lab
products.description: Hands-on laboratory for learning and experimenting with NLP
products.fullDescription: NLP Intelligent Lab is a hands-on environment for exploring and building natural language processing systems. Experiment with text preprocessing, feature extraction, syntax and semantic analysis, sequence models, transformers, language generation, dialogue systems, speech processing, sentiment analysis, and more. Build, test, and deploy NLP models in a practical workspace designed for innovation and research.

products.name: CV Intelligent Lab
products.description: Hands-on lab for exploring computer vision and visual AI systems
products.fullDescription: CV Intelligent Lab is a practical environment for experimenting with computer vision techniques. Build and test models for image classification, object detection, face recognition, video analysis, and more. Ideal for prototyping and exploring visual AI applications in a unified workspace.

products.name: ML Intelligent Lab
products.description: Hands-on lab for building and experimenting with machine learning models
products.fullDescription: ML Intelligent Lab is a practical environment for designing, training, and evaluating machine learning models. Experiment with feature engineering, data preprocessing, supervised and unsupervised algorithms, cross-validation, ensemble methods, and model deployment in a unified workspace for real-world ML applications.

products.name: DL Intelligent Lab
products.description: Hands-on lab for designing and experimenting with deep learning models
products.fullDescription: DL Intelligent Lab is a practical workspace for building, training, and testing deep learning models. Explore neural networks, convolutional and recurrent architectures, transformers, sequence modeling, generative networks, and model deployment. Ideal for experimenting with advanced AI techniques in a unified lab environment.

products.name: AI Intelligent Lab
products.description: Practical lab for experimenting with general AI systems and applications
products.fullDescription: AI Intelligent Lab is a unified environment for building, testing, and deploying artificial intelligence systems. Explore machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, natural language processing, reinforcement learning, and multimodal AI applications. Ideal for prototyping intelligent systems and experimenting with AI solutions across domains.

products.name: Sentiment Model
products.description: Pre-trained model for analyzing emotions and opinions in text
products.fullDescription: Sentiment Model is a multi-class sentiment analysis system for text data, capable of classifying input as Positive, Negative, Neutral, or Irrelevant. It uses a custom preprocessing pipeline with CountVectorizer, TF-IDF transformation, and a Logistic Regression classifier, providing fast, interpretable, and robust predictions for text-based applications.
features: Multi-class Sentiment Analysis (Positive, Negative, Neutral, Irrelevant)

products.name: Dev Link
products.description: All-in-one productivity suite and developer toolkit
products.fullDescription: Dev Link is a robust, all-in-one software suite built to streamline workflows for developers and power users. It unifies essential productivity apps—like spreadsheets, text editors, and schedulers—with professional technical tools, including an IP finder, reverse engineering utilities, and a toy HTML compiler. With integrated features for file sharing, messaging, and project tracking, Dev Link provides a centralized platform for creation, collaboration, and code management.

products.name: Gita Py
products.description: Python library for Bhagavad Gita verses and NLP datasets
products.fullDescription: Gita Py is a specialized Python library designed to provide programmatic access to the Bhagavad Gita. It allows developers to easily retrieve verses, chapter summaries, and titles while offering robust validation tools. Beyond standard retrieval, Gita Py is structured to serve as a semantic and ethical dataset for AI applications, making it an ideal resource for spiritual NLP, topic modeling, sentiment analysis, and fine-tuning Large Language Models (LLMs) on philosophical texts.

products.name: Pharmacy Management
products.fullDescription: Comprehensive software handling inventory, prescriptions, billing, and customer management for pharmacies.

products.name: Gym Management
products.fullDescription: All-in-one gym management solution for member tracking, attendance, and workout planning.

products.name: Dev Link Web
products.fullDescription: Browser-based version of Dev Link for seamless collaboration.

products.name: J Invoice Web
products.description: Professional web-based invoicing and billing platform
products.fullDescription: J Invoice Web (Jaiho InvoiceGen) is a comprehensive, free web-based invoicing solution designed for speed and professionalism. It empowers businesses to generate customized invoices with advanced features like multi-currency support, flexible tax calculations (global, per-item, or common), and recurring billing. Users can fully personalize documents by uploading company logos and adding digital signatures, ensuring every PDF export looks polished and official.

products.name: Kernel Pulse
products.description: Real-time service status page and connectivity monitor
products.fullDescription: Kernel Pulse is a lightweight, serverless status page designed for real-time infrastructure visibility. It combines a browser-based dashboard with a secure serverless function to accurately check the reachability and response time of websites and APIs without CORS limitations. Configurable entirely via a single JSON file, it features auto-refresh monitoring, a 'Quick Probe' tool for ad-hoc URL testing, and a rate-limited public API for developers—all operating without databases or background tracking.

products.name: Mini Color Lab
products.fullDescription: Color-coded password management system with strong encryption.

products.name: J IP
products.fullDescription: Shows IP address, browser info, ISP, OS, and location details.

products.name: Ed-Tech Platform
products.fullDescription: Comprehensive e-learning platform with course management and student tracking.

products.name: Kernel Pulse API
products.description: Lightweight monitoring API for websites and services
products.fullDescription: Kernel Pulse API is a RESTful API that allows developers to integrate real-time website, API, and service monitoring into their applications. Built on a serverless architecture, it provides accurate connectivity status and response times without the need for databases or background jobs. Ideal for lightweight dashboards, monitoring scripts, and quick service checks, the API returns JSON-formatted responses and is fully rate-limited for fair usage.
features: Real-time connectivity and response time checks
Lightweight integration for dashboards and scripts
No database or background monitoring required

products.name: J IP API
products.description: IP, geolocation, and browser information API
products.fullDescription: J IP API is a free, no-authentication API that provides detailed information about IP addresses, geolocation, ISP, and client browser details. It is designed for developers to quickly retrieve accurate IP and location data in JSON format. Fully CORS-enabled and lightweight, it works seamlessly in web and backend applications for analytics, personalization, and monitoring purposes.

products.name: Kernel Vault
products.fullDescription: Planned: Advanced encrypted storage solution for sensitive data.

products.name: Hawkin AI
products.fullDescription: User uploads any video link (Reel, YT), AI fetches content, uses STT for transcription, and LLM to provide a summary.

products.name: AI Micro Stories
products.fullDescription: Platform for creating 8-second AI-generated videos and micro-stories for social media.

products.name: True-Positive
products.fullDescription: AI Media House product focused on content authenticity.

products.name: Quantum Products
products.fullDescription: Next-generation quantum computing algorithms and simulations.

products.name: Electronics
products.fullDescription: IoT devices, embedded systems, and custom hardware solutions.

resources.fullDescription: Centralized documentation hub for Visio AI, Kernel Pulse, and all Jaiho products.

resources.fullDescription: Educational materials to master our ecosystem and underlying technologies.
